items.defaultValue: <center style="background-color: #414141; padding: 10px; margin: -13px; border-radius: 0 0 4px 4px; z-index: 1; position: relative;">▲</center>
Import online Themes here!

HowTo Import a Backup:
  1. 1. Copy the settings from the HTML, SVG or JSON backup file
  2.     - Open HTML backups with any browser
  3.     - Open JSON backups with any editor
  4. 2. Paste the settings in the input field
  5. 3. Click on LOAD BACKUP
  6. 4. Save the watchface

attributes.placeholder: JSON or settings from SVG or HTML file
